verses.kjv: Now these were the sons of David, which were born unto him in Hebron; the firstborn Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess:
verses.web: Now these were the sons of David, who were born to him in Hebron: the firstborn, Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second, Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess;
verses.ct: These are the sons born to David while he lived in Hebron: His firstborn was Amnon, whose mother was Ahinoam from Jezreel. His second was Daniel, whose mother was Abigail from Carmel.

verses.kjv: The third, Absalom the son of Maachah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur: the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith:
verses.web: the third, Absalom the son of Maacah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur; the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith;
verses.ct: The 3rd was Absalom, whose mother was Maachah, the daughter of King Talmai of Geshur. The 4th was Adonijah, whose mother was Haggith.

verses.kjv: The fifth, Shephatiah of Abital: the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife.
verses.web: the fifth, Shephatiah of Abital; the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife:
verses.ct: The 5th was Shephatiah, whose mother was Abital. The 6th was Ithream, whose mother was David's wife Eglah.

verses.kjv: These six were born unto him in Hebron; and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.
verses.web: six were born to him in Hebron; and he reigned there seven years and six months. He reigned thirty-three years in Jerusalem;
verses.ct: These 6 sons were born to him in Hebron, where he reigned for 7 years and 6 months. He then reigned in Jerusalem for 33 years.

verses.kjv: And these were born unto him in Jerusalem; Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bathshua the daughter of Ammiel:
verses.web: and these were born to him in Jerusalem: Shimea, Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bathshua the daughter of Ammiel;
verses.ct: These sons were born to him in Jerusalem: Shimea, Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon — 4 sons by Bathshua the daughter of Ammiel.

verses.kjv: Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,
verses.web: and Ibhar, Elishama, Eliphelet,
verses.ct: He also had Ibhar, Elishama, Eliphelet,

verses.kjv: And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
verses.web: Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,
verses.ct: Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,

verses.kjv: And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.
verses.web: Elishama, Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.
verses.ct: Elishama, Eliada, and Eliphelet — 9 sons in all.

verses.kjv: These were all the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.
verses.web: All these were the sons of David, in addition to the sons of the concubines; and Tamar was their sister.
verses.ct: These were all of David's sons, not counting the sons born to his concubines. Tamar was their sister.

verses.kjv: And Solomon’s son was Rehoboam, Abia his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,
verses.web: Solomon’s son was Rehoboam, Abijah his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,
verses.ct: Solomon's son was Rehoboam, whose son was Abia, whose son was Asa, whose son was Jehoshaphat,

verses.kjv: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,
verses.web: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,
verses.ct: whose son was Joram, whose son was Ahaziah, whose son was Joash,

verses.kjv: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,
verses.web: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,
verses.ct: whose son was Amaziah, whose son was Azariah, whose son was Jotham,

verses.kjv: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,
verses.web: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,
verses.ct: whose son was Ahaz, whose son was Hezekiah, whose son was Manasseh,

verses.kjv: Amon his son, Josiah his son.
verses.web: Amon his son, and Josiah his son.
verses.ct: whose son was Amon, whose son was Josiah.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Josiah were, the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.
verses.web: The sons of Josiah: the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, and the fourth Shallum.
verses.ct: Josiah's sons were: Johanan the firstborn, Jehoiakim the 2nd, Zedekiah the 3rd, and Shallum the 4th.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.
verses.web: The sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, and Zedekiah his son.
verses.ct: Jehoiakim's sons were: Jeconiah and Zedekiah.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Jeconiah; Assir, Salathiel his son,
verses.web: The sons of Jeconiah, the captive: Shealtiel his son,
verses.ct: The sons of Jeconiah, who was taken captive: Assir, and his son Salathiel,

verses.kjv: Malchiram also, and Pedaiah, and Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
verses.web: Malchiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
verses.ct: along with Malchiram, Pedaiah, Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Pedaiah were, Zerubbabel, and Shimei: and the sons of Zerubbabel; Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister:
verses.web: The sons of Pedaiah: Zerubbabel and Shimei. The sons of Zerubbabel: Meshullam and Hananiah; and Shelomith was their sister;
verses.ct: Pedaiah's sons were Zerubbabel and Shimei. Zerubbabel's sons were Meshullam and Hananiah, and Shelomith was their sister.

verses.kjv: And Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushabhesed, five.
verses.web: and Hashubah, Ohel, Berechiah, Hasadiah, and Jushab Hesed, five.
verses.ct: There were also Hashubah, Ohel, Berechiah, Hasadiah, and Jushabhesed — 5 in all.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.
verses.web: The sons of Hananiah: Pelatiah and Jeshaiah; the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shecaniah.
verses.ct: Hananiah's sons were Pelatiah and Jesaiah. Then came the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, and the sons of Shechaniah.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Shechaniah; Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah; Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.
verses.web: The son of Shecaniah: Shemaiah. The sons of Shemaiah: Hattush, Igal, Bariah, Neariah, and Shaphat, six.
verses.ct: Shechaniah's son was Shemaiah. Shemaiah's sons were Hattush, Igeal, Bariah, Neariah, and Shaphat — 6 in all.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.
verses.web: The sons of Neariah: Elioenai, Hizkiah, and Azrikam, three.
verses.ct: Neariah's sons were Elioenai, Hezekiah, and Azrikam — 3 in all.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Elioenai were, Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Dalaiah, and Anani, seven.
verses.web: The sons of Elioenai: Hodaviah, Eliashib, Pelaiah, Akkub, Johanan, Delaiah, and Anani, seven.
verses.ct: Elioenai's sons were Hodaiah, Eliashib, Pelaiah, Akkub, Johanan, Dalaiah, and Anani — 7 in all.
